attributes.action: Help the Building/Construction Industry - Save our Jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been announced that over 6000 jobs within the Building and Construction Industry have been lost due the "credit crunch" We need the Prime Minister to do somthing to help the thousands of people and more besides who will loose their jobs in the next 6 months unless action is taken. Please sign this petition on behalf of all the people that have lost their jobs due to the thousands of redundancies. We need the Prime Minister to take a stand and realise that he needs to act now to stop an economic downfall this Country is now facing!!
